"Varme":
"This is an ARKS break area.
Feel free to take a load off, and chat around if you'd like."
"Take your time, and head back into battle refreshed."

"If you've not been there yet
shall I give a brief introduction?"
"Have you been to a Food Stand" yet?"""

"You can bring fresh ingredients to a Food Stand,
and they'll cook up some Quick Food you can eat immediately."
"Eating Quick Food will temporarily strengthen an ARKS."

"First, try collecting some ingredients like
nuts, vegetables, or Tames meat from outside the city."
"After getting some, let's bring those ingredients to the food stand."
"You can then combine them freely to make Quick Food."

"It's always a good idea to eat some Quick Food
before going into a tough battle."
"If feel exhausted,<se>please come relax at this Rest Corner."

"Is that so?
I'll see you around then."
